trans-unit.source: Represents localizability settings for an element in BAML.
trans-unit.target: 表示可本地化性 BAML 中的某个元素的设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability"></xref> class with a specified formatting tag and localizability attribute.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability"></xref>具有指定的格式设置标记和本地化属性的类。

trans-unit.source: Assign a non-empty value to this parameter to indicate inline formatting.
trans-unit.target: 将非空值分配给此参数以指示内联格式设置。
关联的元素的本地化属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the associated element's localizability attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联的元素的本地化属性。

trans-unit.source: If the localizability attribute indicates that the element is not localizable, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability.FormattingTag%2A> value will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地化属性指示元素不是可本地化，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability.FormattingTag%2A>值将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability.FormattingTag%2A>
关联的元素的本地化属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the associated element's formatting tag.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联的元素的格式设置标记。

trans-unit.source: If the value is an empty string, the element will not be formatted inline.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为空字符串，该元素不会格式化的内联。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the element will be represented by child placeholder in the parent’s content.
trans-unit.target: 相反，元素将由父级的内容中的子占位符来表示。
格式设置的标记字符串。
